name: radioplayerv2.2
description: An Telegram Bot to Play Nonstop Radio/Music/YouTube Live in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather

SESSION_STRING.description: Session string, use @greenstri to generate pyrogram session string

CHAT.description: ID of Channel or Group where the Bot plays Radio/Music/YouTube Lives

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist if CHAT is a Group, if channel then leave blank

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands (for multiple users seperated by space)

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Change it to 'True' If you want to make /play commands only for admins of CHAT. By default /play is available for all.

MAXIMUM_DURATION.description: Maximum duration of song to be played using /play command

STREAM_URL.description: URL of Radio station or Youtube Live video url to stream with /radio command

REPLY_MESSAGE.description: A reply message to those who message the USER account in PM. Make it blank if you do not need this feature.
